title: The Four Dragons
description: In this Chinese 'How and Why' story, Kim tells us how four dragons help to save the people from drought, and why the dragons end up as the four main rivers which run through China.
itunes:title: The Four Dragons
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
itunes:summary: In this Chinese 'How and Why' story, Kim tells us how four dragons help to save the people from drought, and why the dragons end up as the four main rivers which run through China.
